title: Sorting Algos Visualizer
alt: Image of a sorting algorithms visualizer
description: A desktop & mobile-compatible vanilla JavaScript (ES6), HTML, and CSS site visualizing various sorting algorithms including insertion sort, selection sort, Quicksort, Merge sort, and Stalinsort -- a humorous O(n) algo

title: Runje.org
description: The Git repository for this very website built in React.JS, which includes front-end stage management, automatic generation of JSON-formatted, user-inputted content information, resuable components, and managing of client-side routing with React Router

title: Froggit
description: Written in Python, this assignment, a recreation of the famous 1980's hit and marks the final project of CS 1110 at Cornell University. This game makes extensive use of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and JSON file format.
